body.name: Knife Set, 15 Pieces Kitchen Knife Set with Block, German Stainless Steel Knife Block Set, Dishwasher Safe, Black
features: 【Sharp, Non-Stick & Rust-Resistant】Black kitchen knife set uses a unique anti-rust, anti-stick and anti-oxidant Teflon coating, so that the blade is always in the best condition, extremely easy to clean, greatly extending the life of the knife.

【Dishwasher Safe】This knife sets for kitchen with block is dishwasher safe, easy to maintain. Perfect for storage after washing and drying. The whole body of the knives set for kitchen is made of premium stainless steel material. The surface layer has a high-grade anti-rust coating, which will not rust as easily as other kitchen knife sets, and will not cause damage despite the high intensity impact of the dishwasher.

【All in One Knife Set】15 pieces knife set includes: 8" Chef knife, 8" Slicing knife, 7" Santoku knife, 8" Serrated bread knife, 5" Utility knife, 3.5" Paring knife, 6Pcs 4.5" serrated steak knife, 1 Pc kitchen shear, sharpener,and Black hard wood Knife Block.

【Comfortable and Non-slip Handle】The knife handle material is made of German high carbon stainless steel.Designed by the most professional designers to meet the ergonomic handle, so that the knife is very comfortable to use, even for a long time, the hand will not feel any discomfort. To improve the safety of using the knife, we have also designed extra anti-slip air holes for the handle to ensure safety when making delicious food.
【Lifetime Warranty】Each knife set are backed by excellent quality and undergo strict quality inspection, we provide a lifetime warranty for every customer, please feel free to purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Astercook One-Piece 15 Pieces All-Metal Knife Set (Elegant Black)

8" Chef knife The chef's knife is the most commonly used knife in the kitchen for cutting, slicing, dicing and other cutting activities. 7" Santoku Knife The ridges on the blades are specially designed to prevent foods from sticking while you slice, making them perfect for chopping and dicing vegetables. 8" Bread Knife The bread knife has a serrated blade that effortlessly slices through bread, baguettes and other ingredients easily. 8" Slicing Knife Perfectly engineered slicing knife tapered to a razor-sharp edge for effortless carving and slicing of roast, beef, pork, poultry as well other larger fruits and vegetables.

6 Pcs 4.5" serrated steak knife The 6 Pcs 4.5" serrated steak knife work well for slicing and carving meat, cheese, butter, bread, baguette, turkey, pizza, ham, brisket, fish, vegetables, fruit, and especially beef and steak. 5" Utility Knife The 5" utility knife is specially designed to cut, carve all types of fruits and vegetables and effortlessly remove fat or tendons from meat 3.5" Paring Knife The paring knife has a smaller blade that helps make precise cuts with ease and enhances fine work in the kitchen. Precision slicing, chopping and peeling - everything is a breeze. Shears and Sharpening rod No need to worry about the knife becoming not sharp enough, high quality sharpening rod to keep the knife in the best condition all the time.

Dishwasher Safe This knife sets for kitchen with block is dishwasher safe, easy to maintain. Perfect for storage after washing and drying. The whole body of the knives set for kitchen is made of premium stainless steel material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I would by this over and over again but it is so high quality I may never have to. I would love to see what other products they have available and offer my honest feed back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Knives are fantastic - no dishwasher
reviews.reviewText: Bought the set two years ago as a Christmas gift. We have been very pleased with them. Instructions recommend not putting them in dishwasher which we haven’t done and so far have not had to sharpen them. They have stayed very sharp! Only complaint was with the scissors. The bolt area started rusting after a while and they just broke the other day. The handle cracked and then broke in two. I’m not sure if the lifetime warranty applies to the scissors or just the knives but I’m going to contact the company.I would have given a 4.5 star due to the scissors but the knives and block are fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice set of knives for a good value.
reviews.reviewText: The knives are very nice and they are sharp. They are well balanced and feel comfortable when chopping. They can be washed in the dishwasher, but make sure to dry them well right away to prevent any spots or staining. I learned this from their customer service which is 5 stars for sure. It is hard to get a solid knife of this quality in this price range and I am very happy I did. The steak knives are much better than some of the bigger name brands we have used. Overall a great purchase and hopefully will last for years to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these knifes
reviews.reviewText: This set looks good in the counter, stays sharp, and is super easy to clean. Definitely worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not actually dishwasher safe
reviews.reviewText: Very stylish and really light weight. Although, I know it’s best to hand wash, but I wanted to find a set that I can put in the dishwasher and this was one of them. I don’t have time in the day and I just wanted a good quality set that could withstand being in the dishwasher use after use. No worry set. I had one steak knife so far in the dishwasher and he had like a rusty spot on it like my last set. 😣 I got it off and since then, been hand washing the set. 😣 I thought about returning but really don’t want to go through and look for another. It took a lot of research and days to finally settle on this set. 😞 Plus side is the knives are super sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek. Sturdy. Sexy as hell.
reviews.reviewText: Got these as a Mother’s Day gift and let me tell You, she was SOOO satisfied. They cut like a dream! She needed something that was dishwasher safe. I/we LOVE the look of these knives. One simple, solid piece of metal. Very sexy! Pleasant to hold, beveled edges, but they don’t slip from Your grip. Perfect. Just perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Knife Block set
reviews.reviewText: The knife set itself is gorgeous! I did have a knife arrive knicked directly on the edge of blade and one steak knife had a flaw. I reached out to customer service and they were so helpful and attentive to my issue. Great support! Will update review after moderate use but they seem very durable and great for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This kitchen knife set was great! It replaced our old one which was getting rusty after a few years. After about 2 years we have had no problems with it!
Love the set so far. Well made and heavy enough to handle, real sharp. Have been washing them by hand buy they are supposedly dishwasher safe. No regrets
